name: Homebuyer's Education and Learning Program (HELP)
short_desc: Provides counseling for first time homebuyers. Offers classes on details of preparing to buy a home
description: Provides counseling for first time homebuyers. Two four-hour classes provide information on preparing to buy a home, including cleaning up your credit, savings plans, shopping for lenders, loan pre-approval, fair housing laws, and more. Completion of classes is necessary for certification.
